sources.title: The Savant | FULL MOVIE | Drama, Action | MMA Fighter Crime Story
sources.description:
A high school student with autism and a natural fighting ability is trained by a suspended cop who has dreams of becoming an MMA fighter.

Robert Loggia, Martin Kove, Eric Roberts, Joyce DeWitt, Julie McCullough, Eric Etebari, Frank Giglio, Miguel Jarquin-Moreland, Kenneth Del Vecchio, Suzy Kaye
2013

Crime
Drama
Directed by Sherri Kauk

Edited for YouTube ad standards

metadata.Plot: An autistic high school student with fighting abilities is trained by a suspended police officer who has dreams of becoming a MMA fighter.
